name: All Grades
description: The All Grades data set returns one row for each gradable item for each learner in each course offering. Note: Course offerings must be the direct or indirect children of a specific org unit. For example, you can export all grade items for: Required Permission Advanced Data Sets > Can execute All Grades (Organization level)

columns.name: User Id
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the user.

columns.name: Org Defined Id
columns.description: User's Org Defined Id (often the learner identifier from an SIS system).

columns.name: Username
columns.description: User's username.

columns.name: First Name
columns.description: User's first name.

columns.name: Last Name
columns.description: User's last name.

columns.name: Is Active
columns.description: Learner's status.

columns.name: Role Id
columns.description: User's role Id at the specific course offering.

columns.name: Role Name
columns.description: User's role at the specific course offering.

columns.name: Course Offering Id
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the course offering.

columns.name: Course Offering Code
columns.description: Often the course identifier from an SIS system.

columns.name: Course Offering Name
columns.description: Name of the course offering.

columns.name: Course Section Id
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the section.

columns.name: Course Section Code
columns.description: Client defined code for the section.

columns.name: Course Section Name
columns.description: Name of the section.

columns.name: Grade Item Category Id
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the category in which the grade item belongs.

columns.name: Grade Item Category Name
columns.description: Name of the category in which the grade item belongs.

columns.name: Grade Item Id
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for a grade item. Note: The final calculated grade and final adjusted grades will be included.

columns.name: Grade Item Name
columns.description: Name of the grade item.

columns.name: Grade Item Weight
columns.description: Weight of the grade item.

columns.name: Grade Item Start Date
columns.description: Date the grade item will become visible in the grade book.

columns.name: Grade Item End Date
columns.description: Date the grade item will become invisible in the grade book.

columns.name: Points Numerator
columns.description: Numerator of the grade value.

columns.name: Points Denominator
columns.description: Denominator of the grade value.

columns.name: Grade Value
columns.description: Value of the grade with the grade scheme applied.

columns.name: Grade Last Modified
columns.description: Date that the grade was last modified. Note: This is a UTC formatted date/time stamp in accordance with the org's local time zone.

columns.name: Grade Comments
columns.description: Comments/feedback left for the user.

columns.name: Grader User Id
columns.description: User Id of the last user that modified the grade.

columns.name: Grader Org Defined Id
columns.description: Org Defined Id of the last user that modified the grade.

columns.name: Grader Username
columns.description: Grader's username.

columns.name: Grader First Name
columns.description: First name of the last user that modified the grade.

columns.name: Grader Last Name
columns.description: Last name of the last user that modified the grade.

columns.name: Exclude From Final Grade
columns.description: Whether this grade value is not used in the final grade calculation.

columns.name: Grade Object Type
columns.description: Grade object type name.
